LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_RestorePart.label: restore body part
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_RestorePart.description: Restores missing golem parts that do not require a specific upgrade.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_MuscleTissue.label: graft muscle tissue
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_MuscleTissue.description: Grafts muscle tissue onto the golem to enhance strength and endurance.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_DigestiveOrgans.label: add digestive organs
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_DigestiveOrgans.descriptio: Increases the efficiency of energy absorbed and used by the golem by 10% for digestive system added.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_EnergySynthesis.label: enhance nutrient absorption
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_EnergySynthesis.descriptio: Increases the rate energy dispersed throughout the golem.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_LifeStage.label: enhance automaton biomass
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_LifeStage.description:
Enhances the flesh golem by removing excess or unnecessary body parts or organs and replacing them with extra muscle tissues, sinew and bone to further shape the flesh golem into a lethal abomination. This upgrade provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Movement: +[20%/35%/50%] Health: +[30%/50%/70%]
In addition, this upgrade allows the flesh golem to use their rage to tear the limbs off their enemies.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_LeftArm_Bracer.label: craft golem left bracer
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_LeftArm_Bracer.description: Adds a metallic bracer to the arm of a flesh golem to increase blunt damage and allow blocking.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_RightArm_Bracer.label: craft golem right bracer
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_RightArm_Bracer.descriptio: Adds a metallic bracer to the arm of a flesh golem to increase blunt damage and allow blocking.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_LeftArm_Cleaver.label: craft golem left cleaver
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_LeftArm_Cleaver.descriptio: Adds a metallic cleaver to the arm of a flesh golem, enabling an AoE cutting attack and allows the golem the ability to harvest plants and trees.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_RightArm_Cleaver.label: craft golem right cleaver
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_RightArm_Cleaver.descripti: Adds a metallic cleaver to the arm of a flesh golem, enabling an AoE cutting attack and allows the golem the ability to cut down plants and trees.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_Tusks.label: attach tusks
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_Tusks.description: Inserts tusks into the mandibles of a flesh golem.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_Horns.label: attach horns
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_Horns.description: Attaches horns into the skull of a flesh golem. Horns grant the flesh golem the lethal gore attack and allows the golem to charge into battle.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_SkullPlate.label: graft skull plate
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_SkullPlate.description: Grafts a metal plate around the skull of a flesh golem.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_ShoulderPlates.label: graft shoulder plates
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_ShoulderPlates.description: Grafts metal plates onto the shoulders of a flesh golem.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_ChestCage.label: attach chest cage
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_ChestCage.description: Improves frontal body armor by grafting a cage made from the bones of human corpses around the chest.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_SpineGuard.label: attach spine guard
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_SpineGuard.description: Improves back armor by grafting a shell made from the bones of a corpse along the spinal column of a flesh golem.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_Wings.label: attach wings
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_Wings.description: Increases speed and balance by grafting wings into the back of a flesh golem. These wings are not intended for flight, rather they serve the golem by helping it offset some of its considerable bulk during combat.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_LegPlates.label: graft leg plates
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_LegPlates.description: Grafts metal plates around the legs of a flesh golem.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_EyesT1.label: insert quad-eyes
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_EyesT1.description: Inserts a pair of eyes underneath the original pair that improve vision and reduces the chance the golem can be fully blinded.
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_EyesT2.label: carve evil eye
LanguageData.TM_FleshGolem_EyesT2.description: Carves an eye socket into the forehead of a flesh golem that is filled with molded magicyte in the shape of an eye. Arcane symbols are etched around the eye, forming a magical link between the golem and the eye. The evil eye is able to manifest the suppressed rage of the flesh golem to curse their target with feebleness.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_RepairComponent.label: Part restoration
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_RepairComponent.descripti: Replaces missing golem parts that do not require an upgrade.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_EnergyCell.label: mana cell
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_EnergyCell.description: Creates a mana pocket for storing additional mana.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_EnergyConverter.label: mana converter
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_EnergyConverter.descripti: Increases the efficiency of mana absorbed and used by the golem by 10%.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_EnergyCharge.label: mana polarity
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_EnergyCharge.description: Increases the mana regeneration rate of the golem by 6 per hour.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Axe.label: Hollowed Axe
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Axe.description: Fuses a thrumbo axe to the arcane extremities of the hollow golem. When swung, this axe releases a wave of arcane energy that is capable cleaving through multiple foes and almost any armor.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Staff.label: Hollowed Staff
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Staff.description: Fuses a staff of blazing power and staff of the defender to the hollow golem, creating the hollowed staff. The hollow golem can use this staff to launch magical projectiles without consuming energy.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Armor.label: Hollowed Breastplate
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Armor.description: Upgrades the armor of the golem: Blunt: +21% Sharp: +32% Heat: +14%
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Helm.label: Hollowed Helm
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Helm.description: Increases armor of the golem by protecting the head: Blunt: +22% Sharp: +7% Heat: +9%
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Shoulder.label: Hollowed Shoulder Guards
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Shoulder.description: Increases armor of the golem with armor that protects the shoulders and neck: Blunt: +8% Sharp: +19% Heat: +6%
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Crown.label: Crown of Awakening
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Crown.description: Equips the hollow golem with the Crown of Awakening which allows it to detect and nullify magic of other pawns.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Cloak.label: Fade Cloak
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_Cloak.description:
Equips the hollow golem with the Fade Cloak allowing it to instantly move to another location.
Blunt: +10% Sharp: +5% Heat: +15% Harmony: +5% Move Speed +.4c/s
Ability: Fade
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_PGFire.label: Protection Gem: Fire
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_PGFire.description:
Equips the golem with a fire amulet which provides a protective fire ward. Burning Fury provides a 35% damage reduction to all attacks, cauterizes wounds, prevents being staggered, and burns nearby enemies. Only one protection gem may be worn.
Cooldown: 1200s Duration: 100s Energy Cost: 50
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_PGWater.label: Protection Gem: Water
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_PGWater.description: Equips the golem with a water amulet which enables the golem to evade attacks. The chance to evade an attack is proportional to the golem's energy percent and reduces the golem's energy by 5 for each evasion.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_PGArcane.label: Protection Gem: Arcane
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_PGArcane.description: Equips the golem with a arcane amulet which enables the Well of Despair ability. Well of Despair encases an area in a reverse shield which allows projectiles in but blocks projectiles from exiting.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_PGDeath.label: Protection Gem: Death
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_PGDeath.description: Equips the golem with a death amulet which surrounds the golem with an aura of death. Nearby enemies can be stricken with a curse that degrades their willpower and ability to fight.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_PGDoom.label: Protection Gem: Death's Abyss
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_PGDoom.description: Equips the golem with a death's abyss amulet which slows nearby enemies in a movement debilitating field. This effect can trigger every 15s and effects enemies within 30 cells.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_FGFire.label: Focus Gem: Fire
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_FGFire.description: Adorns the hollow golem with a fire element focus gem allowing it to use the fire blossom ability. Fire blossom creates 25 explosive firebolts and targets a cluster of enemies from 6 to 50 cells. Consumes 40 energy. Targets may catch fire. Only one focus gem may be attached.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_FGIce.label: Focus Gem: Ice
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_FGIce.description: Adorns the hollow golem with a gem containing elemental water allowing it to use the ice blossom ability. Ice Blossom creates a burst of 20 ice shards and targets a cluster of enemies from 8 to 60 cells away. Costs 60 energy. Ice shards inflict high amounts of bleeding. Only one focus gem may be attached to a golem.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_FGArcane.label: Focus Gem: Arcane
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_FGArcane.description: Adorns the hollow golem with a gem containing condense arcane energy, allowing it to create a concentrated bolt of dark energy. Darkbolt targets enemies up to 100 cells away. Costs 80 energy. Only one focus gem may be attached to a golem.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_FGDeath.label: Focus Gem: Death
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_FGDeath.description: Adorns the hollow golem with a gem containing death's essence, surrounding the golem with a field radiating death. Death Field periodically strikes nearby enemies. This ability is the only focus gem that does not require casting. Targets enemies within 10 cells of the golem. Costs 20 energy but gains a free strike for any pawn that dies within the field. Only one focus gem may be attached to a golem.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_OrbOfExtinguishedFlames.d: Equipping the hollow golem with the Orb of Extinguished Flames allows it to peek behind the veil of death to extract knowledge. Points into the active research technology will increase for every pawn killed on the map. The orb can also be toggled to detect and consume any fire within 25 cells and emits a faint silver light. These effect are only active while the hollow golem is dormant. The flames of devouring apathy and orb of extinguishing flames cannot be used together, these two upgrades share the same component slot.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_FlamesOfDevouringApathy.d: The Flames of Devouring Apathy grant a hollow golem the ability to regulate temperature. The flames will also consume any filth within 25 cells and emit a faint mystical light. These effect are only active while the hollow golem is dormant. The flames of devouring apathy and orb of extinguishing flames cannot be used together, these two upgrades share the same component slot.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAFire.label: Coat of Arms: Fire
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAFire.description:
Outfits the hollow golem with a fire attuned coat of arms which provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Movement: +[0.2c/0.3c/0.35c] Heat Armor: +[30%/50%/60%] Processing: +[10%/20%/30%] Cooldown: -[10%/20%/30%]
In addition, decay touch deals bonus burn damage and the golem can absorb nearby fire to restore health.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAIce.label: Coat of Arms: Water
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAIce.description:
Outfits the hollow golem with a water attuned coat of arms which provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Armor: +[5%/10%/15%] Ability Cooldown: -[10%/20%/30%] Processing: +[10%/20%/30%]
In addition, decay touch heals the golem and one friendly pawn within 10 + 3*level cells for 10 + 4*level health.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAArcane.label: Coat of Arms: Arcane
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAArcane.description:
Outfits the hollow golem with an arcane attuned coat of arms which provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Ability Cooldown: -[12%/24%/36%] Ability Damage: +[10%/20%/30%] Processing: +[15%/30%/45%]
In addition, decay touch restores 20 + 5*level energy per hit.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoADeath.label: Coat of Arms: Death
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoADeath.description:
Outfits the hollow golem with a death attuned coat of arms which provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Armor: +[5%/10%/15%] Ability Cooldown: -[8%/16%/24%] Ability Damage: +[10%/20%/30%] Processing: -[5%/10%/15%]
In addition, decay touch is 50% more effective and strikes twice.
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_AffinityFire.label: Affinity: Fire
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_AffinityFire.description: Strengthens the golem's ties to elemental fire; orange eye color. The fire affinity provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Movement: +[25/40/50]% Health: +[40/60/75]%
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_AffinityIce.label: Affinity: Water
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_AffinityIce.description: Strengthens the golem's ties to elemental water; light blue eye color. The water affinity provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3] Movement: +[20/30/35]% Health: +[50/75/90]%
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_AffinityArcane.label: Affinity: Arcane
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_AffinityArcane.descriptio: Enhances the golem's arcane alignment; magenta eye color. The arcane affinity provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3] Movement: +[15/25/30]% Health: +[55/85/100]%
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_AffinityDeath.label: Affinity: Death
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_AffinityDeath.description: Strengthens the golem's ties to death magic; green eye color. The death affinity provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3] Movement: +[10/15/20]% Health: +[65/90/110]%
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_RepairBlock.label: Part restoration
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_RepairBlock.description: Replaces missing golem parts that do not require an upgrade.
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_EnergyMax.label: energy cell
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_EnergyMax.description: Creates an energy cell that increases maximum energy by 120 per cell.
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_EnergyConverter.label: energy converter
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_EnergyConverter.descript: Increases the efficiency of energy absorbed and used by the golem by 10%.
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_EnergyRegen.label: energy generator
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_EnergyRegen.description: Increases the energy regeneration rate of the golem by 4 per hour.
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_Armor.label: Armor
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_Armor.description: Each upgrade increases the armor of the golem per level [1,2,3]: Blunt: +[9,16,21]% Sharp: +[13,22,29]% Heat: +[8,14,18]%
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_LifeStage.label: frame tier
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_LifeStage.description: Improves and refines the golem's frame each level [1,2,3]: Movement: +[10/20/30]% Health: +[40/70/100]%
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_Power.label: Power
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_Power.description: The shem hamephorash is further enhanced, allowing the Maharal golem the ability to produce an excess power.
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_Heat.label: Heat
LanguageData.TM_MaharalGolem_Heat.description: The shem hamephorash is further enhanced, allowing the Maharal golem the ability to produce an excess heat.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_RepairComponent.label: repair component
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_RepairComponent.descripti: Replaces missing golem parts that do not require a specific upgrade.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_EnergyCell.label: power cell
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_EnergyCell.description: Creates a power cell and installs it into a mecha-golem.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_EnergyConverter.label: energy converter
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_EnergyConverter.descripti: Increases the efficiency of energy absorbed and used by the golem by 10%.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_EnergyCharge.label: electrical neuro-core
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_EnergyCharge.description: Increases the energy charge rate of the golem by 10 per hour.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_Axe.label: mecha-axe
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_Axe.description: Forges an axe and mounts it to the left arm attachment.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_Sword.label: mecha-sword
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_Sword.description: Forges a sword and mounts it to the left arm attachment.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_Hammer.label: mecha-hammer
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_Hammer.description: Forges a hammer and mounts it to the right arm attachment.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_GatlingCannon.label: gatling cannon
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_GatlingCannon.description: Attaches a minigun onto the right shoulder mount of a mecha-golem.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_MiningLaser.label: mining laser
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_MiningLaser.description: Creates a mining laser to attach to the left shoulder mount.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_Extinguisher.label: extinguisher
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_Extinguisher.description: Adds built-in steam exhaust vents that can be used to quickly disperse fires on and around the golem.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_BallisticPlate.label: ballistic plate
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_BallisticPlate.descriptio: Upgrades the bodyarmor of the golem with ballistic plate; incurs a movement penalty.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_FlameCore.label: flame core processor
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_FlameCore.description:
The flame core processor provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Movement: +[0.5c/0.9c/1.2c] Processing: +[10%/20%/30%] Ability Damage: +[10%/20%/30%] Energy Cost: +[10%/20%/30%]
In addition, the flame core allows the golem the ability to attract and burn nearby filth, gaining energy in the process.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_WaterCore.label: water core processor
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_WaterCore.description:
The water core processor provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Armor: +[5%/10%/15%] Ability Cooldown: -[10%/20%/30%] Healing Bonus: +[100%/200%/300%] Energy Cost: -[15%/30%/45%]
In addition, the water core allows the golem the ability to quickly regenerate health while active and regenerate health to its dormant frame.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_EarthCore.label: earth core processor
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_EarthCore.description:
The earth core processor provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Armor: +[10%/18%/25%] Ability Cooldown: +[5%/10%/15%] Healing Bonus: +[60%/120%/180%] Energy Cost: +[5%/10%/15%] Processing: +[15%/30%/45%]
In addition, the earth core allows the golem the ability to shield itself from damage.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_LightningCore.label: lightning core processor
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_LightningCore.description:
The lightning core processor provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Movement: +[1.2c/1.8c/2.2c] Ability Cooldown: -[15%/30%/45%] Energy Cost: +[10%/20%/30%] Processing: -[5%/10%/15%]
In addition, the lightning core allows the golem the ability to retaliate against melee attackers with a jolt of energy, stunning them briefly.
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_FlameShard.label: Flame shard base
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_FlameShard.description: The flame shard automaton base provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Movement: +[15%/30%/40%] Health: +[15%/30%/40%]
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_WaterShard.label: Water shard base
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_WaterShard.description: The water shard automaton base provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Movement: +[10%/15%/20%] Health: +[30%/50%/70%]
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_EarthShard.label: Earth shard base
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_EarthShard.description: The earth shard automaton base provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Health: +[40%/80%/120%]
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_LightningShard.label: Lightning shard base
LanguageData.TM_Mecha-Golem_LightningShard.descriptio: The lightning shard automaton base provides the following benefits per upgrade level [1/2/3]: Movement: +[25%/50%/75%]
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_RepairBlock.label: Part restoration
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_RepairBlock.description: Replaces missing golem parts that do not require an upgrade.
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_EnergyMax.label: energy cell
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_EnergyMax.description: Creates an energy cell that increases maximum energy by 120 per cell.
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_EnergyConverter.label: energy converter
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_EnergyConverter.descriptio: Increases the efficiency of energy absorbed and used by the golem by 10%.
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_EnergyRegen.label: energy generator
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_EnergyRegen.description: Increases the energy regeneration rate of the golem by 4 per hour.
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_Armor.label: Hardening
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_Armor.description: Each upgrade increases the armor of the golem: Blunt: +4% Sharp: +11% Heat: +6%
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_LifeStage.label: frame tier
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_LifeStage.description: Improves and refines the golem's frame each level [1,2,3]: Movement: +[10/20/30]% Health: +[40/70/100]%
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_Compactor.label: Compactor
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_Compactor.description: Outfits the hollow golem with a stone compactor able to crush stone chunks into usable brick.
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_SandstoneBricks.label: crush sandstone
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_SandstoneBricks.descriptio: Deposits sandstone chunks into the golem to be crushed into usable blocks.
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_GraniteBricks.label: crush granite
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_GraniteBricks.description: Deposits granite chunks into the golem to be crushed into usable blocks.
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_LimestoneBricks.label: crush limestone
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_LimestoneBricks.descriptio: Deposits limestone chunks into the golem to be crushed into usable blocks.
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_SlateBricks.label: crush slate
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_SlateBricks.description: Deposits slate chunks into the golem to be crushed into usable blocks.
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_MarbleBricks.label: crush marble
LanguageData.TM_StoneGolem_MarbleBricks.description: Deposits marble chunks into the golem to be crushed into usable blocks.
